articles.title: Novavax coronavirus vaccine is safe, published results show - CNN
articles.description: A coronavirus vaccine being developed by Novavax appears safe and elicits an immune response, according to a study published Wednesday in The New England Journal of Medicine. The results had previously been announced by the company in early August.
